casebody.data:
The State ex rel. A.C. Leasing [Company], Appellee, v. Industrial Commission of Ohio; Baker, Appellant.

[Cite as State ex rel. A.C. Leasing Co. v. Indus. Comm. (1998), 83 Ohio St.3d 114.]

(No. 96-2722 Submitted July 15, 1998 Decided September 16, 1998.) Buckingham, Doolittle & Burroughs, L.P.A., and Richard A. Hernandez, for appellee. Jurus Law Offices and Steve C. Carr, for appellant.

The judgment of the court of appeals is affirmed consistent with the opinion of the court of appeals.

Moyer, C.J., Douglas, Resnick, F.E. Sweeney, Pfeifer, Cook and Lundberg Stratton, JJ., concur.
